official_title: Congratulating the Syracuse University men's lacrosse team on winning the NCAA Division I National Championship.

summary.text: Congratulates the Syracuse University men's lacrosse team for winning the 2004 NCAA Division I National Championship. Recognizes the achievements of all the team's players, coaches, and support staff and invites them to the U.S. Capitol to be honored. Requests that the President recognize the team's achievements and invite them to the White House for an appropriate ceremony.

titles.title: Congratulating the Syracuse University men's lacrosse team on winning the NCAA Division I National Championship.
